fixed_skill.desc: Deal Physical damage to all foes equal to 30.0/31.5/33.0% of Attack (1 to 3 hits).
fixed_skill.name: Rampage

innate_skill.desc: Increase critical rate by 4.2% when ambushing.
innate_skill.name: Fortified Moxy I

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical rate by 4.2%. After a Baton Pass, increase damage by 28% for 1 turn.
passive_skill.name: Skillful Combo

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical rate by 4.2%. After a Baton Pass, increase damage by 33% for 1 turn.
passive_skill.name: Skillful Combo I

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Physical damage to all foes equal to 180.0%/192.6%/205.2% of Attack.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
